benefits.description:

Select one qualifying airline and then receive up to $100 per calendar year in statement credits when incidental fees, such as baggage fees and other incidentals, are charged by the airline to your Premier Rewards Gold Card Account.*‡*American Express relies on accurate airline transaction data to identify incidental fee purchases. If you do not see a credit for a qualifying incidental purchase on your eligible Card after 4 weeks, simply call the number on the back of your Card. See terms & conditions for more details.

You can get 2x Membership Rewards® points per eligible dollar spent, in addition to a $75 hotel credit to spend on qualifying dining, spa, and resort activities when you book a prepaid stay of at least two consecutive nights at participating properties, at americanexpress.com/hc.‡

rates.text: No interest charges because you pay your balance in full each month.‡¤

dtwHeadline: Your special Platinum Card<sup>®</sup> offer awaits.
dtwBenefitHeadline: THE PLATINUM CARD WITH EXCITING BENEFITS.
dtwBenefitSubHeadline: APPLY TODAY TO EXPERIENCE ALL OF THESE BENEFITS AND MANY MORE.‡
keyFeaturesHeadline: Explore the Power of the Platinum Card
benefitsHeadline: A World of Benefits Awaits You.
superHighlightImgAlt: Enjoy airport lounge access and Priority Pass™ Select enrollment with the Platinum Card® from American Express.

fee.text: The annual fee for the Platinum Card is $550. The annual fee for Additional Cards is $175 for up to 3 Additional Cards. The annual fee for the 4th or more Additional Card is $175 for each Card. There is no additional fee for Gold Cards.<sup>¤</sup>

featured.description:
Get to where you need to be for less, with this exclusive benefit. Enjoy $15 in Uber credits for U.S. rides each month plus a bonus $20 in December1, simply because you're a Platinum Card Member. That can be up to $200 in annual Uber savings.‡

1Credit and Uber VIP status available to Basic Card Member only

travel.description:
When travel calls, we answer. The American Express Global Lounge Collection℠‡ unlocks access to more than 1,000 airport lounges across 120 countries and counting. Our unmatched worldwide coverage is made possible through our own networks, The Centurion® Lounge and The International American Express lounges, as well as our partner networks, Delta Sky Club® and Priority Pass™ Select lounges.

Based on comparison with other U.S. credit card programs, as of 5/2017.

shopping.description:
Wasn't a Perfect Match? No worries. If you try to return an eligible item purchased with your Card within 90 days from the date of purchase and the merchant won't take it back, Return Protection‡ may provide a refund.

Limited to $300 per item and $1,000 per calendar year. Purchases must be made in the U.S. and its territories.

reward.description:
• 5X Membership Rewards® points on flights booked directly with airlines or with American Express Travel
• 5X Membership Rewards® points on prepaid hotels booked on amextravel.com.‡

benefits.description:
Get to where you need to be for less, with this exclusive benefit. Enjoy $15 in Uber credits for U.S. rides each month plus a bonus $20 in December1, simply because you're a Platinum Card Member. That can be up to $200 in annual Uber savings.‡

1Credit and Uber VIP status available to Basic Card Member only

• 5X Membership Rewards® points on flights booked directly with airlines or with American Express Travel
• 5X Membership Rewards® points on prepaid hotels booked on amextravel.com‡

Enjoy perks while you fly.
Feel free to check your bags or enjoy an in-flight meal on us. Select one qualifying airline and then receive up to $200 per calendar year in statement credits when incidental fees are charged by the airline to your Platinum Card® account.*‡

Qualifying airlines include Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, Delta Airlines, Frontier Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, JetBlue Airways, Spirit Airlines, Southwest Airlines, and United Airlines.

*American Express relies on accurate airline transaction data to identify incidental fee purchases. If you do not see a credit for a qualifying incidental purchase on your eligible Card after 4 weeks, simply call the number on the back of your Card. See terms & conditions for more details.

When travel calls, we answer. The American Express Global Lounge Collection℠‡ unlocks access to more than 1,100 airport lounges across 120 countries and counting. Our unmatched worldwide coverage is made possible through our own networks, The Centurion® Lounge and The International American Express lounges, as well as our partner networks, Delta Sky Club® and Priority Pass™ Select lounges.

Based on comparison with other U.S. credit card programs, as of 11/2017.

Watch points add up. When you use your Platinum Card®, you can earn one Membership Rewards® point for every dollar you spend on eligible purchases.‡
Use points to treat yourself to rewards from over 500 leading brands in travel, shopping, dining and entertainment.‡

welcomeOffer.header: Upgrade to Platinum and Rethink Every Experience You've Ever Had
welcomeOffer.description: Enjoy exciting benefits, elevated experiences and premium service that The Platinum Card can provide. Upgrading your Card is simple - Your account number will not change and any existing Additional Card(s) will also be upgraded. You can continue using your existing Card(s) until you receive the new Card(s).

featured.description:
From now through July 31, 2018: Earn 2 Starpoints® for every dollar of eligible purchases on the Card at participating SPG® and Marriott Rewards® hotels. Earn 1 Starpoint for all other eligible purchases.

Note: On August 1, 2018, SPG will convert every one Starpoint in a loyalty member account to three points. In general, corresponding redemption changes will occur. Visit members.marriott.com for details.
Effective August 1, 2018: Earn 6 points for every dollar of eligible purchases on the Card at participating SPG and Marriott Rewards® hotels. Earn 2 points for all other eligible purchases.‡

travel.header: Redeem Starpoints<sup>®</sup> for free flights with SPG Flights with no blackout dates.
travel.description: Redeem Starpoints® for free flights on over 150 airlines with SPG Flights with no blackout dates. Transfer Starpoints to over 30 airline frequent flyer programs, mostly on a one-to-one basis.‡ Receive a 5,000 Starpoint bonus when you transfer 20,000 Starpoints to a participating frequent flyer program.‡

benefits.description:
From now through July 31, 2018: Earn 2 Starpoints® for every dollar of eligible purchases on the Card at participating SPG® and Marriott Rewards® hotels. Earn 1 Starpoint for all other eligible purchases.

Note: On August 1, 2018, SPG will convert every one Starpoint in a loyalty member account to three points. In general, corresponding redemption changes will occur. Visit members.marriott.com for details.
Effective August 1, 2018: Earn 6 points for every dollar of eligible purchases on the Card at participating SPG and Marriott Rewards® hotels. Earn 2 points for all other eligible purchases.‡

Redeem Starpoints® for free nights at any of Starwood's 11 distinct brands‡ including St. Regis, The Luxury Collection, W Hotels, Le Méridien, Westin, Sheraton, Aloft, Element Hotels, Four Points by Sheraton, Tribute Portfolio and Design Hotels.‡

Some hotels and resorts have mandatory service charges.
SPG® Card Members enjoy international travel without foreign transaction fees from American Express when using their Card on purchases abroad.<sup>‡</sup><sup>¤</sup>
